title.narrative: Increasing household income and livelihood security for women in the Central African Republic

description.narrative: This project will support vulnerable women in the Central African Republic to build businesses, increase household income and challenge underlying discrimination, enabling them to escape poverty building a secure future for their families. Over 3 years in 3 locations, this project will provide literacy, numeracy, vocational and business training to women who are marginalised because they have experienced sexual, physical, financial or psychological abuse – or simply because they are women.
